name: Horror Maze (HollybloxCVA)
description: When you play the game, its seems like a normal maze game made from PowerPoint right? Well, your only half wrong. Why the game may not be that scary, there is still a jumpscare. Also, the game might be very poorly built. It's also made to be spoopy, just like Baldi's Basics in Education and Learning. Just enjoy the game! ;)
